grup_data.group_description: The delicate way each crystal is cut leads to a truly glittering light piece, rich in detail. Rudolf is precisely designed to ensure that the trimmings, candle holders and central elements emit maximum radiance from every angle. The delicate way each crystal is cut leads to a truly glittering light piece, rich in detail. Rudolf is precisely designed to ensure that the trimmings, candle holders and central elements emit maximum radiance from every angle.

Rudolf’s grandeur is softened by the pearly tones of opaque glass. Complemented by fresh colour accents in the form of lampshades, it loses none of its original splendour, but offers a more gentle statement piece for intimate settings and interior schemes where a more subdued effect is desired. The delicate way each crystal is cut leads to a truly glittering light piece, rich in detail. Rudolf is precisely designed to ensure that the trimmings, candle holders and central elements emit maximum radiance from every angle.

The exquisite way in which each crystal on Rudolf is cut leads to a glittering light piece, rich in detail and perfect for examining up close. The Rudolf wall sconce is decorated with prisms and available with either two or three candles.

Rudolf contemporary’s frosted glass and lampshades create a whimsical addition to hallways, entryways, guest rooms and more. More like a piece of art, the lamp serves both a functional and decorative purpose. The Rudolf wall sconce is decorated with prisms and available with either two or three candles.

The classic Rudolf undergoes a design update to create a more condensed silhouette in a still intricate and bold piece. Called Crown, designer Lukáš Uliarczyk scripted a new dialogue with repetition and symmetry to emphasize the elegance of the glass arms and the light reflecting properties of crystal. The classic Rudolf undergoes a design update to create a more condensed silhouette in a still intricate and bold piece. Called Crown, designer Lukáš Uliarczyk scripted a new dialogue with repetition and symmetry to emphasize the elegance of the glass arms and the light reflecting properties of crystal.

urunler.Glass: Hand-blown Full Lead Crystal with Silvering
Hand-blown Full Lead Crystal with Silvering

grup_data.group_description: Is there a more regal light piece than this? Maria Theresa’s sumptuous feminine curves and shimmering trimmings embraced by a metal and glass arm design can expand horizontally to provide radiance and atmosphere to any space. The Maria Theresa is a chandelier of sumptuous curves and shimmering crystal pendalogues. This chandelier illuminated the majestic coronation of Maria Theresa in 1743, who is said to have fallen in love only twice in her life, ﬁrst with her husband, Francis I, and secondly with this mesmerizing chandelier. Found at Prague Castle and the Schönbrunn Palace, amongst others, this is a truly regal light piece.

Maria Theresa becomes playful with a contemporary look featuring opaque white glass and a range of lively colours. Its opulence is soothed while the coloured glass decorations and lampshades add youthful femininity and a sense of light-hearted splendour. The opulence of Maria Theresa has been paired-down and made playful by using white and a range of fresh colours. The white satin glass quietens the piece, and the coloured glass decorations and lampshades add a youthful touch to achieve a completely new and contemporary chandelier for wide range of interior spaces that seek fresh luxury and a sense of light-hearted splendour.

grup_data.group_name: Maria theresa Wall sconces Historic design
grup_data.group_description: Featuring tall candles, the Maria Theresa historic wall sconce is the perfect complement to long hallways and high ceilings. The geometric cuts of the trimmings ensure brilliant reflections. The Maria Theresa wall sconce offers either two or three candles.

grup_data.group_name: Maria theresa Wall sconces Contemporary colour
grup_data.group_description: With floral details and colourful shades, the contemporary version of the Maria Theresa wall sconce is an adaptable design for modern hallways, entryways, public spaces and more. The wall sconce is available with either two or three candles.

Warm reflections and a sense of quiet majesty is seen and felt when experiencing King, a luxuriously vibrant piece by Rony Plesl. The geometry and shape of the original Maria Theresa has been completely reimagined into a highly affecting contemporary piece, striking in its simple yet monumental design and bold colour scheme. Venus opens up King's design for a more composed piece. Renowned Czech designer, Rony Plesl, has created two dichotomous variations of the original Maria Theresa—reimagining the historic chandelier into two separate, yet complimentary contemporary pieces,striking in their simplicity yet monumental in design and colour scheme. Both use structures of hoops, but in contrasting ways.

Enduring elegance and unrivalled beauty -- Eugene has stood the test of time thanks to its modern simplicity. Its startling silhouette is formed from central elements that are free from ornateness; the arms and candleholders uncomparable in their reflective possibilities. A classic glass-arm Bohemian chandelier from the original 18th century workshop of Josef Palme. What makes this chandelier so remarkable is its clear, modern simplicity—the central elements, arms and candleholders are free of ornament, making for a startling silhouette of timeless elegance and unrivalled poise.

Injecting the elegant original with a contemporary palette, Eugene is now extravagant, brave and adventurous. Freshness and energy is brought to interiors, with colours including bright green, warm rose and calming blue. Injecting the elegant original with a contemporary palette, Eugene is now extravagant, brave and adventurous. Freshness and energy is brought to interiors, with colours including bright green, warm rose and calming blue.

urunler.Glass: Light Rose, Green & Light Blue / Frosted
Light Rose, Green & Light Blue / Frosted
Light Rose, Green & Light Blue / Frosted

grup_data.group_description: Eugene’s beauty stems from its smooth, no cut, simple glass design. Its transparency adapts to any interior whether historic or contemporary and brightens the path of long hallways or acts as warm welcome in entryways. The wall sconce is available with either two or three candles.

The contemporary Eugene wall sconce brightens up spaces with a striking modern look. The flattering flora hues glow from the simple, clean design. This light is available with either two or three candles which makes it the perfect option in both smaller and larger spaces.

Reflection and form take on new meaning with Echo,a dynamic take on Eugene. Designer Frank Tjepkema maintained the original grace and elegance but introduced intrigue with unusual shapes and reflections. Reflection and form take on new meaning with Echo, a dynamic take on Eugene. Designer Frank Tjepkema maintained the original’s grace and elegance but introduced intrigue with unusual shapes and reflections.

This iconic Bohemian brass arm chandelier was a revolution for its time, enchanting 18th century high society. It still mesmerizes today. A cast brass chandelier, heavily inﬂuenced by Louis XIV’s chandeliers, it is a bold, expansive statement of light, radiating luxury. New methods of casting brass revolutionised the production of chandeliers in the 18th century whilst simultaneously enchanting high society. Louis enchants still, with its compelling silhouette and intense glow.

Keeping Louis's elemental geometry, this chandelier produces a softer glow, achieved through the use of colour and lampshades. Because of the assortment of surface finishes and hues, a relaxed elegance can be brought to a variety of interiors. The dominant silhouette of the original has been softened through colour, which instantly lifts the atmosphere of the piece. The addition of lampshades not only diﬀuses the light, but also adds to this more relaxed elegance, perfect for above table settings, as shadows are minimised. The new colours allow for variations of mood or tone, to suit a variety of intimate or majestic settings.

Louis is a cast brass chandelier and when modified to a wall sconce becomes a bold piece of art. The intense glow that Louis radiates attracts passers-by to pause for a moment and discover the handcrafted craftsmanship. The wall scone is available with either two or three candles

The dominant silhouette of the original Louis has been softened through colour and lamp shades which instantly lift the atmosphere of the space. The colours allow for variations in mood or tone. The Louis contemporary wall sconce offers either two or three candles.

A daring piece, Mercury incorporates one of the best design elements of its predecessor; the ability of its surface to reflect light. Designer Rony Plesl used striking brass to create a confident installation while still reflecting refinement and luxury. Czech designer Rony Plesl has transmuted the form of the original frame and arms into an entirely new, strong, and decisive light piece. Mercury retains the perfect design intent of its predecessor – to use its surfaces to reflect light – but uses new laser cutting technology to achieve this result, and has added retract and extend capabilities. The striking form of the frame is smooth and highly polished, leading to an industrial look, whilst maintaining sophistication and charm.

The Fractal family features an industrial aesthetic inspired by nature. A fractal structure is a never-ending pattern. They can be found in nature, for example in the leaves, branches and roots of trees. Our Fractal designed by an internationally established product designer Thomas Feichtner features metal branches and hand cut crystal plates that mirror these natural motifs through a modular structure and reflecting patterns of crystal light. The chandelier’s construction is created through tubular metal ‘branches’ which not only give the fixture its artistic shape, but also conceal the light sources. The branches end with hand-blown crystal plates. The chandelier comes in five different sizes.

The Fractal family features an industrial aesthetic inspired by nature. A fractal structure is a never-ending pattern. They can be found in nature, for example in the leaves, branches and roots of trees. Our Fractal designed by an internationally established product designer Thomas Feichtner features metal branches and hand cut crystal plates that mirror these natural motifs through a modular structure and reflecting patterns of crystal light. Single solitaires of Fractal are also available for a contemporary look in a smaller space, or to cluster together in groups of three, five, or seven pendants.

Eye-catching crystal splendour with a historic design finish, George is the perfect addition to traditional settings looking for glamour as well as contemporary spaces wanting a bit of dazzle. The George family of brilliant chandeliers is named after King George II of Britain and the so-called English Regency style of chandeliers.     Its enduring appeal lies in the fact that the geometrical arrangements of the chandelier’s trimmings are put into the spotlight while its structural elements remain in the shadows. Crystal octagons and drops form the chandeliers body with a traditionally pressed metal belt featuring floral motives bringing the piece together.

grup_data.group_name: Rudolf - floor lamps Lamps Historic design
grup_data.group_description: Rudolf is precisely designed to ensure that the trimmings, candle holders and central elements emit maximum radiance from every angle. Even the chrome finish lends itself to this brilliance. Rudolf boasts a generous amount of trimmings which means this is an unmissable, free standing chandelier.

urunler.product_name: Rudolf - floor lamps Lamps Historic design

grup_data.group_name: Rudolf - floor lamps Lamps Contemporary colour
grup_data.group_description: For a softer ambience, the Rudolf contemporary floor lamp adds colourful lampshades and features pearly tones of frosted glass. Lamp shades are available in four colour choices for maximum design potential. This modern style is the perfect accent piece for intimate settings.

urunler.product_name: Rudolf - floor lamps Lamps Contemporary colour

grup_data.group_name: Rudolf - table lamps Lamps Historic design
grup_data.group_description: Rudolf appears as if it were sculpted from pure ice, so brilliant are the cut crystal trimmings. This lamp features long candles which makes the historic chandelier translate perfectly to the more intimate setting of a table. The lamp is available with one, three or five candles.

grup_data.group_name: Rudolf - table lamps Lamps Contemporary colour
grup_data.group_description: The contemporary version of the Rudolf table lamp offers colourful lamp shades which make it the perfect addition to side tables and entryways. The dense cut and number of trimmings reflect the maximum amount of light to create brilliant atmospheres. The table lamp is available with one, three or five candles and creates complementary mood lighting for living spaces.

grup_data.group_name: Maria theresa - floor lamps Lamps Historic design
grup_data.group_description: The Maria Theresa is a chandelier of sumptuous curves and shimmering crystal pendalogues. Bringing this historic piece down to eye level provides the opportunity of studying the beautiful Bohemian craftsmanship up close.

urunler.product_name: Maria theresa - floor lamps Lamps Historic design

grup_data.group_name: Maria theresa - floor lamps Lamps Contemporary colour
grup_data.group_description: The Maria Theresa floor lamp features coloured glass decorations and lampshades for a youthful touch. It’s the perfect accessory to add a touch of fresh luxury to a space.

urunler.product_name: Maria theresa - floor lamps Lamps Contemporary colour

grup_data.group_name: Maria theresa - table lamps Lamps Historic design
grup_data.group_description: Be surrounded by the sparkle of crystal. The regal Maria Theresa moves gracefully to the table. All the better to enrich interiors with her hand-blown beauty. Up close, the handcrafted details, like the famed rosette trimmings, can be carefully discovered.The Maria Theresa table lamp features three candles.

urunler.product_name: Maria theresa - table lamps Lamps Historic design

grup_data.group_name: Maria theresa - table lamps Lamps Contemporary colour
grup_data.group_description: With its crown-like shape the contemporary Maria Theresa table lamp brings an opulent yet gentle design. These lamps features three candles and provide a sense of light-heartened splendour to modern rooms.

urunler.product_name: Maria theresa - table lamps Lamps Contemporary colour

grup_data.group_name: Eugene - table lamp Lamps Historic design
Eugene - table lamp Lamps Contemporary colour

grup_data.group_description: Gemma is a mysterious light which features a glowing crystal heart. It’s the perfect combination of contemporary heritage, with its modern form featuring traditional glass cutting techniques and material. Available in crystal and frosted version, the crystal showcases the cut crystal inside while the frosted gives off an enigmatic glow. Gemma also features a diamond cut which beautifully refracts light and a wedge cut which creates a soft glow.

With its playful reflections from every angle, Siren is one of Preciosa’s most intriguing designs. Three glass bells in differing colours and textures are layered to produce enchanting illumination options. This vivid yet mysterious lamp will bring intrigue to your space with its playful inversion of the classical bell shape and enchanting combination of colours and textures. The three glass bells are layered to hide and reveal, with diﬀerent illumination options, so that there is always interest and new aspects and reﬂections to discover.

urunler.Glass: Grey Frosted / Red Frosted / Crystal Frosted

urunler.Trimmings: Grey Frosted / Red Frosted / Crystal Frosted

grup_data.group_description: Simplicity as the ultimate in sophistication. This lighting solution casts an intimate glow thanks to its compelling form created from a hand-faceted glass cylinder and a quadrangular brushed brass base. In this design the precision cutting of the hand-blown crystal deﬁnes the dispersal of light. The light splinters out from the three types of cut, creating captivating patterns and enhancing the crystal brilliance of the glass. The three styles may be hung in variety, as one, or in a grand arranged scheme.

Shining with sparkle and flair, Flare’s hand-blown crystal is precisely cut to encourage the dispersal of light. Captivating patterns enhance the crystal brilliance of the glass while emphasizing the gold plated body. Flare’s three styles may be hung as one, in variety, or in a grand arranged scheme. In this design the precision cutting of the hand-blown crystal deﬁnes the dispersal of light. The light splinters out from the three types of cut, creating captivating patterns and enhancing the crystal brilliance of the glass. The three styles may be hung in variety, as one, or in a grand arranged scheme.

Mesmerizing Muutos takes its form from traditional glass-blowing shapes and modernizes that grace for a feel that is fluid yet tactil. The subtle beauty and gentle reflections come courtesy of Preciosa masters who hand blow every piece. Muutos celebrates capacity for organic forms in crystal. The basis for the design stems from hundred-year-old wooden moulds, used historically in glass blowing. Each Muutos piece is hand-blown by Preciosa masters, and together with further modern techniques, the overall result is one of enchanting, subtle beauty. Whether a stand-alone centre piece or a collection, Muutos creates a sense of ﬂuidity, rippling with gentle reﬂections and changes in tone and depth of colour, bringing tactility and wonder to any space.

Simple and graceful forms born from Bohemian glass, Soul encompasses innovative design for a look that is singularly enticing. Available in five shapes, Soul can be grouped to sensational effect. The design describes purity, depth and mystery. The simple and graceful form of Souls oﬀers a quiet yet stunning presence to a space. The ﬂoating-like quality of the lamp is achieved through the use of both   frosted and clear glass, oﬀering diﬀuse light in combination with gentle, shining reﬂections. The lamps are available in three shapes and can be grouped to sensational eﬀect.

grup_data.group_description: The radiance of light is showcased in all its glory in the contrast between contemporary moulded glass on the outside and traditional cut glass on the inside. The soft opaque core suspended within sleek clear glass produces a delicate yet energetic light creating a timeless look for any space. With Glory, designer has perfectly balanced two contrasting glass elements—a softly muted, precisely cut, opaque core held suspended within a sleek casing of moulded clear glass. These two combined produce a beautifully delicate yet energetic light, which works wonderfully alone or in a cluster.
